prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the English-Speaking Union Charlottesville Branch, Accession #10599-f, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was deposited by Mrs. Jan Daggett, Charlottesville, Va, 22901 in January 1999.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: International non-profit educational organization founded in 1920 to promote communication and understanding through the medium of the English language. The Charlottesville Branch was founded in 1952.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The papers include minutes, by-laws, reports, correspondence, membership and officer rosters, notice of meetings, invitations, board meetings, brochures, programs, scholarship information, archival material, speakers' programs, and deposit agreements with Alderman Library.
The papers also include a file on a perfomance of a British Embassy Players benefit on behalf of Union's scholarship fund.
